name: Flailing Frogs
description:
WARNING: CONTAINS FLASHING LIGHTS AND (mildly) LOUD SOUNDS (VHS effects on .app version - WebGL plays up) <em>You found an old, dusty game called "Flailing Frogs". With some reluctance, you slid it in and booted it up...</em>

Controls: WASD / arrow keys to move. SPACE to Jump. (You can strafe in the air!)

You play as a fat frog trying to stay alive. Because of your size, lilypads collapse under you. Your sticky tongue isn't what it used to be either, so you will have to rely on your legs. 

Jump between lilypads (careful, they will cave in after a short delay) and grab flies with your mouth. 

Just be careful of the water. Something doesn't look right... I'm Defence101 (LiesLiesLies#2799) and I made most the game, Fly & Lily-pad made by portalj123 (Abigail69#3875)
Sounds made with https://sfxr.me/
Pixel art made with https://www.piskelapp.com/ THIS IS MY FRIST GAME JAM AND MY SECOND ACTUAL GAME WOOOOO!!!! Made in about ~18 hours for Mini-Jam 106: Frogs² :)
Prototype: Final:
